analyzed: rang gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis spras yongs su gnas pa yis //
translated: He is adorned with the circle of his own light,

analyzed: zla ba'i 'od zer tshogs kyi dpal 'joms shin tu zil gnon pas //
translated: and he dwells in the splendor of the moon’s rays.🔽The Blessed One, who has seen the world with his eye of insight,

translated: If the Blessed One, who has conquered the inner foe,

analyzed: ston pa 'jig rten mtha' gzigs de yang nags dag sten mdzad na // yang dag mi rtogs skye bo mi gtsang 'dam du bying gyur pa'i //
translated: and who has seen the world’s end, dwells in the forest,

analyzed: bdag tu log par 'dzin par gyur pas nyin dang mtshan //
translated: Day and night, he is seized by the demon of self-grasping,

original: srin bus ji @195a * //
analyzed: srin bus ji @195a * //
translated: Like a worm,

analyzed: bzhin rnam rtog sdig can dag gis zos pas na // nyon mongs rnag gis nyer gos zhi ba'i chu yi bum pa yis //
translated: consumed by sinful thoughts,🔽bathe your mind in the water of peace,🔽which is free from the impurities of the afflictions,

analyzed: bkrus pa bzhin du sems ni skye ba med nags bsten par gyis // 'bras bu'i lcid kyis yal ga gug pa'i tham lo ma yis //
translated: and go to the forest, where there is no birth.🔽The trees in the forest, which are bent down by the weight of their fruit,

analyzed: gsal gyur lcug ma me tog kha bye'i dga' byed rgyu ldan pa'i //
translated: are the cause of joy for the ascetics, who are like bees,🔽because they are like friends,

analyzed: nags kyi shing ni dge slong phongs bral bsten pa la // mdza' bo bzhin du shin tu dbugs ni 'byin par byed // zla ba shar ba kha ba 'bab pa bsgrigs pas 'gog 'gyur ba'i //
translated: who give relief to the monk who is free from poverty.🔽The nights of winter, which are delightful for those who desire pleasure,

analyzed: dgun gyi mtshan mo dag ni rab zhi bde ba 'dod rnams kyi //
translated: are stopped by the rising of the moon and the falling of snow,🔽and the birds hidden in the trees of the forest make a sound at dawn,

analyzed: rnal 'byor rtsva yi stan la dga' ba dag la tho rangs dag / nags kyi shing na yib pa'i bya rnams 'dra bar byed //
translated: as if they were happy with the yogis who delight in their grass mats.

original: shing dang nye ba'i ri yi rked du mi g-yo skyil krung bcas //
analyzed: shing dang nye ba'i ri yi rked du mi g-yo skyil krung bcas //
translated: Seated cross-legged on the slopes of the mountains,

analyzed: me tog gis bskor rab dga'i rlung gis g-yo bar byed pa na //
translated: Surrounded by flowers, swaying in the breeze of the forest,

analyzed: 'gro gnyen srid gsum rnam rgyal dus na byang chub snying po yi //
translated: the one who is the friend of the world, the conqueror of the three worlds,

analyzed: gdan la bzhugs bzhin sdom can mtshan mo rjes su sgrub par byed //
translated: sits on the seat of enlightenment, and the one who is restrained practices at night.🔽The touch of the mind of inferior beings, the attachment of the proud,

analyzed: dman pa'i 'gro ba'i sems kyis reg byas dregs pa'i chags pa dag /'dod bya don du gnyer ba rnams kyis khyad par spangs nas ni //
translated: the one who is to be desired, the one who is sought after, the one who is abandoned,

original: 'phags pas rjes chags brtan pa mi snang 'ching ba 'jigs pa yi //
analyzed: 'phags pas rjes chags brtan pa mi snang 'ching ba 'jigs pa yi //
translated: the one who is steadfastly attached to the noble ones, the one who is not seen, the one who is bound, the one who is fearful,

analyzed: 'dod pa lhag ma med par dga' bzhin nags su zhi bar bya //
translated: the one who is delighted, the one who is without remainder of desire, the one who is peaceful in the forest.

analyzed: skye dang 'chi dang na ba'i sdug bsngal mthar ni ma byas par //
translated: Without bringing an end to the suffering of birth, death, and sickness,🔽one sinks into the ocean of existence, so do not be careless!

analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag tu bying 'gyur bag med ma byed cig / mthar byed kun gyi srog kyang 'phrog par byed pa gang 'di ni //

analyzed: rgyun mi chad par 'gro la sta re'i so dag 'dar bar byed //

translated: Having understood the nature of the abiding of all phenomena,

analyzed: ro la sems ldan gzhan las dam pas legs par 'gro ba yis //
translated: The one with a mind that is free from attachment to taste,

original: srid la chags bral rab zhi dga' ba dag la brten par gyis //
analyzed: srid la chags bral rab zhi dga' ba dag la brten par gyis //
translated: Should rely on the joy of complete peace, free from attachment to existence.

analyzed: smra ba tsam ni nus su zin kyang tshig la gnas pa 'ang grub med de //
translated: Even if one is able to speak, one does not abide in words.

analyzed: de phyir de nyid la 'jug blo gros yin bzo'i tshig la mkhas //

original: kun nas nyon mongs dgra 'di yi //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs dgra 'di yi //
translated: This enemy of complete affliction

original: bdag nyid bran du gyur pa ste //
analyzed: bdag nyid bran du gyur pa ste //
translated: Has become my own servant.

original: de bas bdag sems zhi byed cing //
analyzed: de bas bdag sems zhi byed cing //
translated: Therefore, I will pacify my own mind

original: rang nyid yongs su smra bar byed //
analyzed: rang nyid yongs su smra bar byed //
